author: dlr
msg: Fix 'svnversion --version' segfault portion of issue #2757 (which had
similar problems as those for 'svnserve --version', fixed in r24385
* subversion/svnserve/svnserve.c
(version): Remove the apr_getopt_t * parameter.  Because we always
call this helper function with this parameter as NULL, we don't
need to pass it at all.
(main): Adjust the call to version() to use the new arguments.
Found by: Daniel Shahaf <danielsh@tigris.org>

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix some merge-tracking OBOEs.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(do_merge, discover_and_merge_children): Fix a couple of off-by-one
errors that happen when the merge target directory is the current
working directory.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/commercial-support.html: Shorten my blurb.  It was the longest,
and I don't want to start an arms race.

author: vgeorgescu
msg: Follow-up to r24510.
* subversion/libsvn_client/list.c
(svn_client_list): Call svn_client_list2, not svn_client_list, thus avoiding
an infinite recursion.

author: kfogel
msg: * notes/sparse-directories.txt: Fix some obsolete material.
